subject: Fashion
title: RuPaul and Mainstream Drag Fashion
description: A 60-second lesson on RuPaul and Mainstream Drag Fashion.

hook.text: In 1993, RuPaul became the first drag queen to land a major cosmetics dealâ€”with MAC.

buildup.text: For decades, drag was underground. Clubs in New York and LA were the only stages.

discovery.text: RuPaul's Drag Race, launched in 2009, turned drag fashion into prime-time entertainment.

twist.text: The show created a new fashion economy. Queens became designers, brand ambassadors, and influencers.

climax.text: Drag went from hidden bars to the Met Gala. One TV show mainstreamed an entire art form.

punchline.text: RuPaul didn't just open the door. He built the runway.

quiz.question: What was RuPaul's groundbreaking 1993 achievement?
options: Becoming the first drag queen with a major cosmetics deal with MAC
Launching the first drag fashion magazine
Winning an Emmy for best costume design
